hero_title:
Everything Your Team Needs.
Nothing It Doesn't.
hero_subtitle: Ten best-in-class tools, one login, one config file. Klyvra replaces your SaaS sprawl with a unified, self-hosted workspace you actually control.
sso_title: One Login. Ten Apps. Zero Friction.
sso_text: Your team logs in once through Authentik and gets immediate access to every tool — wiki, chat, code, files, tasks, email. No separate accounts, no password fatigue, no "which login was it again?"
sso_check1: 7 apps via OIDC, 1 via SAML — all pre-configured out of the box
sso_check2: First login auto-creates the user's account in each app
sso_check3: MFA support built into Authentik (TOTP, WebAuthn, Duo)
sso_check4: Branding-ready login pages — your logo, your domain
sso_visual_redirect: → Redirected to wiki, chat, code, files... all seamless
perms_title: Define Teams Once. Access Syncs Everywhere.
perms_text: Create an "engineering" group and Klyvra gives them code repos, wiki access, and a chat channel — automatically. HR gets timesheets and policies but no source code. New hires? Add them to a group and they get the right access on their first login.
perms_check1: Groups created in Authentik propagate to every app
perms_check2: Per-app role control — admin in one tool, viewer in another
perms_check3: Exclude groups from apps entirely (engineers don't see HR tools)
perms_check4: Membership queued for users who haven't logged in yet
zero_title: Deploy a Whole Company in One Command.
zero_text: No clicking through admin panels. No setup wizards. Klyvra uses blueprints, init containers, and adapters to wire everything together before anyone logs in. The only manual step? Creating your first admin account.
zero_check1: 15 Authentik blueprints auto-configure all SSO providers
zero_check2: Init containers seed API keys, register auth sources, patch configs
zero_check3: 4 webhook adapters keep app permissions in sync in real time
zero_check4: Fully idempotent — safe to restart, re-deploy, upgrade
deploy_text: Start with Docker Compose on a single server for development or small teams. When you're ready to scale, the Helm chart deploys the same stack to any Kubernetes cluster — same config structure, same RBAC model, same apps.
deploy_check1: Docker Compose for dev, staging, and small teams
deploy_check2: Helm chart for Kubernetes production deployments
deploy_check3: Same values.yaml RBAC structure in both
deploy_check4: Runs on any cloud, any bare metal, any EU sovereign infra
scenarios_subtitle: Whether you're a 5-person startup or a 500-person org, Klyvra adapts to how you actually work.
scenario1_text: Spin up a complete workspace in 5 minutes. Wiki, chat, code hosting, file sharing, passwords, email — all with one login. No per-seat costs eating your runway.
scenario2_text: Define engineering, sales, HR, and ops as groups. Each team sees only what they need. Onboard new hires by adding them to a group — every app grants access automatically.
scenario3_text: Data stays on your infrastructure. No US cloud dependencies, no third-party access. GDPR-compliant by architecture. Deploy on Hetzner, OVH, or your own racks.
scenario4_text: Give students and staff a full collaboration suite at zero cost. Unlimited users, no feature gates. Self-host on whatever hardware you have.
scenario5_text: Every component is open source and auditable. No black-box SaaS. Vaultwarden for passwords, end-to-end encryption in Seafile, MFA via Authentik.
scenario6_text: Gitea for code, Mattermost for discussions, Outline for documentation, Vikunja for tasks, Kimai for time tracking — all connected, all with SSO. Ship faster.
adapters_title: Apps That Talk to Each Other.
adapters_text: When you create a group in Authentik, four lightweight adapters instantly create the matching resources: a Gitea org, a Mattermost channel, an Outline group, and a Stalwart mailing list. Add a user to the group and they're added everywhere. Remove the group and everything's cleaned up.
adapters_check1: Real-time sync — changes propagate in milliseconds
adapters_check2: Stalwart auto-provisions mailboxes on first SSO login
adapters_check3: Pending queue for users who haven't logged in yet
adapters_check4: Each adapter is a tiny FastAPI service — easy to extend
adapters_visual_label: What happens when you create a group:
mail_text: Stalwart gives your team full email, calendar (CalDAV), and contacts (CardDAV) — with mailboxes auto-created the moment someone logs in via SSO. Group mailing lists are created automatically when you create a group in Authentik.
mail_check1: IMAP + SMTP + CalDAV + CardDAV in one server
mail_check2: Mailboxes provisioned automatically on first SSO login
mail_check3: Group mailing lists synced from Authentik groups
mail_check4: Works with any mail client — Thunderbird, Apple Mail, mobile
cta_title: Ready to Take Back Your Stack?
cta_text: Deploy your entire office suite in under 5 minutes. Free forever, unlimited users, no strings attached.
